name: Guitar Simulator
detailed_description:
The world's first first-person view guitar playing simulator
The most advanced and realistic guitar simulator in the history.
Full body animation, shocking experience
Animation has stepped on a crazy new level. What others have never done because it is too difficult or have no clue how to do- with my animation experience from my other projects I projected a full-scale guitar playing simulator. All notes can be played - no exceptions.
All strings and every single note from it. And the finger goes to exact location of the fret, of each fret you hold on your keyboard.
Perform on stage. Feel yourself a guitarist. To play hold a string with keyboard and press left mouse button. The play is fully animated.
To create a rabid effect, vr support will be present.

Specifications:

-3D game
-Play a first-person guitar
-Playing on the guitar is fully animated
-Can rotate the camera
-The character has a body
-Can you play chords as well as single notes
-Nice graphics
-VR support
